name: Wag Royale
description:
A fun & silly game where you can adopt puppies of many different breeds! Feed them! Play with them! Train them up to have the hardest wagging tail around! Watch them grow!

Progress through the Wag Royale leagues, facing off against other dogs to show who can wag the other out of the ring and become the champion!

Win prizes! Toys, decorations for your garden, themes, and cosmetics for your dog to wear! Yes, Hats!

Earn money from battles to unlock or upgrade snacks for your dog, and new training events to power them up even further!

Place decorations around your garden to spruce it up! Or use themes to change the whole look of the place!
